reason: Advanced semiconductor manufacturing for iPhone and Mac processors
evidence: TSMC manufactures our custom silicon chips using advanced 3nm process technology.

reason: Contract manufacturing and assembly of devices
evidence: Foxconn serves as our primary contract manufacturer for iPhone assembly and production.
Samsung supplies OLED display panels for our iPhone Pro models and memory components.

reason: GPU chip manufacturing using advanced process nodes
evidence: TSMC manufactures our AI accelerators and gaming GPUs using 5nm and 4nm processes.

reason: High-bandwidth memory for data center GPUs
evidence: SK Hynix provides HBM3 memory critical for our H100 AI accelerators.
Panasonic supplies battery cells for our Model 3 and Model Y vehicles at Gigafactory Nevada.

reason: Cost-effective battery solutions for standard range vehicles
evidence: CATL provides LFP battery packs for our standard range Model 3 and Model Y in China.

reason: AI infrastructure for Azure cloud services
evidence: Microsoft purchases thousands of NVIDIA H100 GPUs to power Azure OpenAI services.
Intel Xeon processors power significant portions of our AWS EC2 compute infrastructure.

reason: Custom AI accelerators and networking equipment
evidence: Broadcom collaborates on custom TPU designs and provides high-speed networking switches for our data centers.

reason: Electric vehicle battery supply for F-150 Lightning and Mustang Mach-E
evidence: LG Energy Solution supplies battery cells and packs for our electric F-150 Lightning pickup truck.
GE Aerospace provides jet engines for our 777X and 787 Dreamliner aircraft programs.
